title: Dream Thief's Hideout Adventure #58
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dream Vault
rooms.description: A dimly lit chamber with walls lined with crystalline bottles, each containing swirling, luminescent mist - stolen dreams. The air shimmers with an otherworldly quality, and whispers of forgotten memories echo softly. Strange symbols glow faintly on the floor, and the scent of lavender and nightshade fills the space. A heavy door to the north leads deeper into the hideout.

items.name: crystal shelf
items.description: A shelf holding dozens of dream bottles, each labeled with a victim's name and date

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A small brass key with a crescent moon engraved on its handle

items.name: locked storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three compartments, secured with various locks

items.name: Dream Thief's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with entries about stolen dreams
items.text: Entry 13: My collection grows. I am Morpheus the Dream Thief, master of the sleeping realm. Tonight I stole 13 dreams at the stroke of midnight - my lucky number, 1313. The extraction chamber is where I process the dreams. Only those who understand my methods can escape.

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A decorative silver key with dream symbols etched into it

items.name: display case of dream bottles
items.description: A glass case showcasing the most precious stolen dreams
items.text: Label: 'Premium Collection - Dreams extracted in the extraction chamber using the dream siphon device. Each dream carefully catalogued by Morpheus the Dream Thief.'

items.name: ornate locked chest
items.description: A chest decorated with moon and star motifs, secured with a brass lock

items.name: dream extraction manual
items.description: A manual detailing the dream theft process
items.text: DREAM EXTRACTION PROTOCOL: The dream siphon device must be used in the extraction chamber. Operator: Morpheus the Dream Thief. Warning: Escape is only possible through the portal room, accessible to those who know the three secrets.

items.name: glowing floor symbols
items.description: Mystical symbols drawn on the floor in luminescent paint
items.text: The symbols form a pattern around the words: 'Morpheus walks in dreams. The siphon steals what sleepers hold dear. The chamber processes all.'

items.name: heavy vault door
items.description: A reinforced door with dream imagery carved into its surface, leading to the workshop

rooms.name: Dream Thief's Workshop
rooms.description: A cluttered workshop filled with strange devices and alchemical equipment. A large dream siphon device dominates the center of the room, connected to tubes and crystalline chambers. Charts showing sleep cycles and dream patterns cover the walls. The extraction chamber hums with residual energy. A mysterious portal door glows softly to the east.

items.name: dream siphon device
items.description: A complex machine with tubes, crystals, and dials used to extract dreams from sleeping victims
items.text: Device label: 'Dream Siphon Mark VII - Designed by Morpheus. Extracts dreams through psychic resonance. Operational since 1313. Handle with care.'

items.name: alchemist's workbench
items.description: A cluttered bench covered with vials, tools, and notes

items.name: research notes
items.description: Detailed notes about dream theft techniques
items.text: Research Log: The dream siphon is my greatest invention. I, Morpheus, have perfected the art of stealing dreams. The extraction chamber allows me to process multiple dreams simultaneously. To escape my hideout, one must answer the three questions of awakening.

items.name: sleep cycle charts
items.description: Charts and diagrams showing optimal times for dream theft
items.text: Chart notation: 'REM sleep occurs in cycles. The extraction chamber is most effective during deep sleep phases. Morpheus the Dream Thief operates primarily at midnight.'

items.name: equipment locker
items.description: A metal locker containing tools and supplies

items.name: identification card
items.description: An ID card with a photo and name
items.text: IDENTIFICATION: Name: Morpheus. Occupation: Dream Thief. Specialization: Dream extraction and storage. Authorized to operate all equipment in the extraction chamber.

items.name: device operation manual
items.description: A technical manual for the dream siphon
items.text: OPERATION MANUAL: The dream siphon device is the primary tool for dream extraction. Only Morpheus is authorized to operate it. All extracted dreams are stored in the vault. Emergency exit available through portal room.

items.name: chamber identification sign
items.description: A metal sign mounted on the wall
items.text: EXTRACTION CHAMBER - Authorized Personnel Only. This chamber is where all dream processing occurs. Operator: Morpheus the Dream Thief.

items.name: glowing portal door
items.description: A shimmering door that seems to exist between reality and dreams. Three questions are inscribed on a plaque beside it in glowing script.

password_questions.question: What is the Dream Thief's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the journal, research notes, and identification card

password_questions.question: What device steals the dreams?
password_questions.hint: Look at the device labels and manuals throughout the workshop

password_questions.question: Where are dreams processed?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention where the dream processing occurs

rooms.name: Escape Portal Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the escape portal! A swirling vortex of light and color fills the center of the circular chamber. The portal pulses with energy, offering passage back to the waking world. Around you, the walls shimmer with images of peaceful dreams - perhaps the ones you've freed by solving the Dream Thief's puzzles. Freedom awaits.

items.name: swirling escape portal
items.description: A magnificent portal of light and energy leading back to reality

items.name: freed dream essences
items.description: Wisps of colorful dream energy floating peacefully around the portal

items.name: portal control pedestal
items.description: A stone pedestal with glowing runes that stabilize the portal
items.text: Portal inscription: 'You have proven yourself worthy by understanding the Dream Thief's secrets. Pass through and return to the waking world.'

rooms.win_message: You step through the swirling portal and feel reality rushing back! The Dream Thief's hideout fades away like a forgotten nightmare. You've escaped Morpheus's lair and freed the stolen dreams. As you awaken in the real world, you realize you've solved all the puzzles and achieved victory. You win!
